protocol.name: P-GSE50679-1
text: CEL files from the Affymetrix Chips were processed by use of the R program (

). The Robust Multi-chip Average (RMA) normalization was performed using the default settings of the corresponding R function. Present, Marginal or Absent (P/M/A) calls were computed with the affy MAS5.0 package . ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 normalized ABS_CALL =

protocol.name: P-GSE50679-2
protocol.text: Plates with 7-d-old seedlings were transferred to Lucite chambers where they were deprived of air by displacement for argon gas (99.9%) for 2 hours. The hypoxic stress (2HS) treatment was applied under dim light (5 to 7 μmol photons m-2 s-1) at the end of light cycle. For non-stress (2NS) treatment, MS plates were placed for 2 hours in the Lucite chambers that were open to ambient air.

protocol.name: P-GSE50679-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seeds were sterilized, stratified for 3 days at 4 °C and grown on solid MS media [0.43 % (w/v) Murashigi Skoog (MS) salts (Sigma)], 0.4 % (w/v) Phytagel (Sigma), 1 % (w/v) sucrose, pH 5.7) in a vertical orientation in a growth chamber (Model # CU36L5, Percival Scientific, Perry, IA) under a long day cycle (16 h light at ~80 μmol photons m-2 s-1 and 8 h darkness) at 23°C for 7 days before treatments.

protocol.name: P-GSE50679-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from frozen pulverized plant tissues using QIAGEN RNeasy Plant Mini kit according to the manufacture's protocol. RNase-Free DNase treatment was conducted during the column purification process.

protocol.name: P-GSE50679-6
protocol.text: Hybridization of 12 μg of biotin-labeled cRNA to each Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (GeneChip System®, Affymetrix) chips were performed at 45 °C for 16 h, in the Affymetrix GeneChip Workstation (hybridization oven 640, Fluidics Station 450), using 10 µg of Biotin-labeled aRNA, according to the manufacturer's protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE50679-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
